A full list of my published work can be found on [Google Scholar](https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=kl3VD7QAAAAJ&hl=en) and [ORCID](https://orcid.org/0000-0002-3597-9429)



```{python}
# | output: true
# | echo: false
import dominate.tags as tags
from parse_publications import make_pub, KEYS_BY_YEAR
from IPython.display import HTML

elements = []
for year in sorted(KEYS_BY_YEAR.keys(), reverse=True):
    keys = KEYS_BY_YEAR[year]
    elements.append(tags.h2(year))
    ul = tags.ul()
    for key in keys:
        try:
            ul += tags.li(make_pub(key))
        except AssertionError:
            print(key)
    elements.append(ul)


html = "\n".join([e.render() for e in elements])

HTML(html)


```
